Description_lang: A former paladin, Farseer Noundo was the first of his people to become a shaman and learn the way of the elements.He is one of the wisest and most powerful shaman in the Earthen Ring, and the former leader of the order.
AuraDescription_lang: Farseer Nobundo has mastered all aspects of shamanism, and can be counted upon to both restore and defend his allies in battle.

description_blz.en_US:
A former paladin, Farseer Noundo was the first of his people to become a shaman and learn the way of the elements.

He is one of the wisest and most powerful shaman in the Earthen Ring, and the former leader of the order.
description_blz.es_MX:
El clarividente Nobundo fue el primero de los suyos en convertirse en chamán y aprender el camino de los elementos. 

Es uno de los chamanes más sabios del Anillo de la Tierra, y el líder anterior de la orden.
description_blz.pt_BR:
Outrora paladino, o clarividente Nobambo foi o primeiro entre seu povo a se tornar xamã e aprender a comungar com os elementos.

É um dos mais sábios e poderosos xamãs da Harmonia Telúrica, e já foi líder da ordem.
description_blz.de_DE:
Scharfseher Nobundo ist ein ehemaliger Paladin, der als Erster seines Volkes zum Schamanen wurde und die Elemente studierte.

Er ist einer der weisesten und mächtigsten Schamanen des Irdenen Rings und war ehemals dessen Anführer.
description_blz.en_GB:
A former paladin, Farseer Noundo was the first of his people to become a shaman and learn the way of the elements.

He is one of the wisest and most powerful shaman in the Earthen Ring, and the former leader of the order.
description_blz.es_ES:
El clarividente Nobundo, antiguo paladín, fue el primero de su pueblo en convertirse en chamán y aprender el arte de los elementos.

Es uno de los chamanes más sabios y poderosos del Anillo de la Tierra, y antiguo líder de la orden.
description_blz.fr_FR:
Ancien paladin, le long-voyant Nobundo fut le premier de ses congénères à devenir chaman et à maîtriser les éléments.

C’est un ancien chef de l’ordre et l’un des membres les plus sages et puissants du Cercle terrestre.
description_blz.it_IT:
Il Chiaroveggente Nobundo, un tempo Paladino, fu il primo della sua gente a diventare uno Sciamano e a imparare a manipolare gli elementi.

È uno degli Sciamani più saggi e potenti del Circolo della Terra, di cui è stato anche capo.
description_blz.ru_RU:
Некогда предсказатель Нобундо был паладином, а потом стал шаманом – первым из своего народа – и познал суть стихий.

Это один из мудрейших и сильнейших шаманов Служителей Земли. Прежде он возглавлял этот орден.
description_blz.ko_KR:
선견자 노분도는 성기사에서 주술사로 전직하여 원소의 가르침을 따른 최초의 드레나이입니다.

그는 대지 고리회에서 가장 현명하고 강력한 주술사 중 하나며, 또한 주술사 연맹의 이전 지도자이기도 합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW:
過去曾任聖騎士的先知諾柏多，是他族人之中最早學習元素之道並成為薩滿的人。

身為陶土議會的前任領導者，他絕對是議會中最具智慧與力量的強大薩滿之一。
description_blz.zh_CN:
作为曾经的圣骑士，预言者努波顿是他的人民中第一个学习元素之道并成为萨满祭司的人。

他是大地之环中最睿智、最强大的萨满祭司之一，也是这个组织曾经的领袖。
